Row.Text: +10[ICON_GOLD] per trade partner. War cannot be declared between this civilization and any other with which this civilization has created four or more trade routes. Can purchase [ICON_PEACE] faith units with [ICON_GOLD] gold.
Training one military unit causes a second of the same unit type to appear adjacent to the city. All siege units have +2[ICON_RANGE_STRENGTH] range and have the indirect fire promotion.
+2[ICON_PEACE] from desert tiles. Any city owned by another civilization not currently at war with the Cyats which converts to the Cyats religion will be captured by the Cyats 5 turns later.
War cannot be declared on this civilization. Civilizations at war with Numydia are subject to attacks by rebels.
